10 CLS(0) 
20 FORY=2TO29
30 P=1
40 IFY>6ANDY<12THENP=3
50 IFY>13ANDY<26THENP=2
60 FORL=1TOP
70 READB,E
80 FORX=BTOE
90 SET(X,Y,8)
100 NEXTX
110 NEXTL
120 NEXTY
130 FORY=0TO3
140 FORX=30TO33
150 SET(X,Y,1) 
160 NEXTX 
170 NEXTY 
180 GOTO180 
190 DATA 20,43,16,47,13,50,10,53,9,54,8,19
200 DATA 23,40,44,55,7,18,24,39,45,56,6,17 
210 DATA 25,38,46,57,6,16,26,37,47,57,6,15,27
220 DATA 36,48,57,4,59,4,59,4,31,34,59,4,30
230 DATA 35,59,4,29,36,59,4,28,37,59,4,30,31
240 DATA 59,6,30,31,57,6,30,31,57,6,19,44,57
250 DATA 7,20,43,56,8,21,42,55,9,22,41,54
260 DATA 10,23,40,53,10,53,11,52,13,50,17,46
